page.title: 09A TRAFFIC COUNT ON THE A47
page.content:
The{A47}road crosses the south-east section of our area.It is the main road linking{Norwich}to{Great Yarmouth . West of Norwich the road crosses the county of{Norfolk}to Kings Lynn.We did a traffic survey to see how busy it was in one hour.
Type of vehicle/To Norwich/To Yarmouth Cars 501 650 Lorries 75 53 Vans 36 52 Bus/Coaches 31 15 Motorbikes 13 4 Cycles 16 3 Caravans 12 0
It was hard doing this because the road was so busy.You felt the "whoosh" from the vehicles as they went past and there were lots of fumes coming off the road.
